languages.text: "Вы сами мне когда-то сказали — держи себя в руках, будь полезной, а не обузой... и теперь вы хотите, чтобы я избавилась от этой штуки на голове? Какой в этом смысл?"
"You told me yourself once... 'Keep yourself under control, be useful, don't be a burden'... And now you want me to take this thing off? How does that make any sense?"
languages.original_text: "Вы сами мне когда-то сказали — держи себя в руках, будь полезной, а не обузой... и теперь вы хотите, чтобы я избавилась от этой штуки на голове? Какой в этом смысл?"

traits.locale_text: "You told me yourself once... 'Keep yourself under control, be useful, don't be a burden'... and now you want me to take this thing off? How does that make any sense?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You told me yourself once... 'Keep yourself under control, be useful, don't be a burden'... and now you want me to take this thing off? How does that make any sense?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You told me yourself once... 'Keep yourself under control, be useful, don't be a burden'... And now you want me to take this thing off? How does that make any sense?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You told me yourself once... 'Keep yourself under control, be useful, don't be a burden'... And now you want me to take this thing off? How does that make any sense?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「以前あなたが言った…”自分自身をコントロールし、役に立ち、重荷にならないこと”ってね…それなのにこれを外せと言うの？言っていることが矛盾してない？」
languages.original_text: "You told me yourself once... 'Keep yourself under control, be useful, don't be a burden'... And now you want me to take this thing off? How does that make any sense?"

traits.locale_text: 「以前あなたが言った…”自分自身をコントロールし、役に立ち、重荷にならないこと”ってね…それなのにこれを外せと言うの？言っていることが矛盾してない？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “你曾经亲口告诉我，说我得‘控制住我自己，当个有用的人，不要变成累赘’……可现在，你又想让我把这东西摘下来？这根本说不通，对不对？”
languages.original_text: "You told me yourself once... 'Keep yourself under control, be useful, don't be a burden'... And now you want me to take this thing off? How does that make any sense?"

traits.locale_text: “你曾经亲口告诉我，说我得‘控制住我自己，当个有用的人，不要变成累赘’……可现在，你又想让我把这东西摘下来？这根本说不通，对不对？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Usted me dijo una vez... que me mantuviera bajo control, que fuera útil, que no fuera una carga... ¿Y ahora quiere que me quite esta cosa? ¿Qué sentido tiene eso?».
languages.original_text: "You told me yourself once... 'Keep yourself under control, be useful, don't be a burden'... And now you want me to take this thing off? How does that make any sense?"

traits.locale_text: «Usted me dijo una vez... que me mantuviera bajo control, que fuera útil, que no fuera una carga... ¿Y ahora quiere que me quite esta cosa? ¿Qué sentido tiene eso?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt mir selbst einmal gesagt ... 'Habt Euch unter Kontrolle, erweist Euch als nützlich, seid keine Last ...' Und jetzt wollt Ihr, dass ich dieses Ding ausziehe? Wie passt das zusammen?"
languages.original_text: "You told me yourself once... 'Keep yourself under control, be useful, don't be a burden'... And now you want me to take this thing off? How does that make any sense?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt mir selbst einmal gesagt ... 'Habt Euch unter Kontrolle, erweist Euch als nützlich, seid keine Last ...' Und jetzt wollt Ihr, dass ich dieses Ding ausziehe? Wie passt das zusammen?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Vous vous souvenez de ce que vous m'avez dit ? "Tant que vous vous tenez tranquille et que vous vous rendez utile"... Et vous voudriez me retirer ce truc ? Ça n'a aucun sens ! »
languages.original_text: "You told me yourself once... 'Keep yourself under control, be useful, don't be a burden'... And now you want me to take this thing off? How does that make any sense?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous souvenez de ce que vous m'avez dit ? "Tant que vous vous tenez tranquille et que vous vous rendez utile"... Et vous voudriez me retirer ce truc ? Ça n'a aucun sens ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Bir keresinde bana demiştin ki... 'Kendini kontrol edip işime yaramaya devam et, bana yük olma.' demiştin... Şimdi de bu şeyi çıkarmamı mı istiyorsun? Akla mantığa sığıyor mu bu?"
languages.original_text: "You told me yourself once... 'Keep yourself under control, be useful, don't be a burden'... And now you want me to take this thing off? How does that make any sense?"

traits.locale_text: "Bir keresinde bana demiştin ki... 'Kendini kontrol edip işime yaramaya devam et, bana yük olma' demiştin... Şimdi de bu şeyi çıkarmamı mı istiyorsun? Akla mantığa sığıyor mu bu?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
